lead_paragraph: Los Angeles prosecutors have filed criminal misdemeanor charges against Southern California Gas Company for failing to report a huge natural gas leak that began in October.

headline.print_headline: California: Los Angeles Charges Gas Company in Leak
headline.main: California: Los Angeles Charges Gas Company in Leak

snippet: Los Angeles prosecutors have filed criminal misdemeanor charges against Southern California Gas Company for failing to report a huge natural gas leak that began in October.
abstract: Los Angeles prosecutors file criminal misdemeanor charges against Southern California Gas Company for failing to immediately leaking natural gas well that began discharging hazardous materials into air since October; ongoing gas leak has affected thousands and forced them to flee their homes.
